issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

resolution.description: A fix for this issue is checked into the tree and tested.
resolution.name: Fixed

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

fields.description:
h3. Steps to Reproduce
I am no longer about to run an app build for either iOS or Android through Studio.

Marcus 
Clearly Innovative

h3. Actual Result
/usr/local/lib/node_modules/titanium/node_modules/longjohn/dist/longjohn.js:184
        throw e;
              ^
Error: ENOENT, no such file or directory '/Applications/Titanium Studio/add-ons/addon-google_apis-google-17/manifest.ini'
    at fs.openSync (fs.js:427:18)
    at fs.readFileSync (fs.js:284:15)
    at /Users/marcusafinley/Library/Application Support/Titanium/mobilesdk/osx/3.1.3.GA/node_modules/node-appc/lib/android.js:173:25
    at /Users/marcusafinley/Library/Application Support/Titanium/mobilesdk/osx/3.1.3.GA/node_modules/node-appc/lib/fs.js:99:3
    at Array.forEach (native)
    at exports.visitDirsSync (/Users/marcusafinley/Library/Application Support/Titanium/mobilesdk/osx/3.1.3.GA/node_modules/node-appc/lib/fs.js:98:5)
    at /Users/marcusafinley/Library/Application Support/Titanium/mobilesdk/osx/3.1.3.GA/node_modules/node-appc/lib/android.js:172:10
    at exithandler (child_process.js:635:7)
    at EventEmitter.emit (events.js:98:17)
---------------------------------------------
    at exports.execFile (child_process.js:691:9)
    at exports.exec (child_process.js:578:18)
    at async.series.cached (/Users/marcusafinley/Library/Application Support/Titanium/mobilesdk/osx/3.1.3.GA/node_modules/node-appc/lib/android.js:86:4)
    at /Users/marcusafinley/Library/Application Support/Titanium/mobilesdk/osx/3.1.3.GA/node_modules/async/lib/async.js:486:21
    at /Users/marcusafinley/Library/Application Support/Titanium/mobilesdk/osx/3.1.3.GA/node_modules/async/lib/async.js:185:13
    at iterate (/Users/marcusafinley/Library/Application Support/Titanium/mobilesdk/osx/3.1.3.GA/node_modules/async/lib/async.js:108:13)
    at /Users/marcusafinley/Library/Application Support/Titanium/mobilesdk/osx/3.1.3.GA/node_modules/async/lib/async.js:119:25
    at /Users/marcusafinley/Library/Application Support/Titanium/mobilesdk/osx/3.1.3.GA/node_modules/async/lib/async.js:187:17
[ERROR] Application Installer abnormal process termination. Process exit value was 8


h3. Expected Result
The opening of the Android emulator or iOS sumulator

comments.body:
Hello Marcus!

Did you already test with the preliminar support for Mavericks?

Check this:

http://www.appcelerator.com/blog/2013/10/upgrading-to-os-x-mavericks/

Let us know if this solves the issue. 

Best,

Mauro
